<template>
  <Child v-bind="$attrs" v-on="$listeners"></Child>
</template>

<script>
import Child from "./Child.vue";
export default {
  name: "GrandSon",
  components: {
    Child,
  },
  // inheritAttrs: false,
  created() {
    console.log(this.$attrs, "attrs");
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.son-two {
  background: lightgreen;
  height: 100%;
  width: 600px;
}
</style>
